column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I loved the idea of tapas as the three of us could share smaller plates and try a variety of different dishes. We started off with the Peach Sangria which was amazing. All of the dishes that we did try were full of flavor. The patatas bravas are a must try when dining here. We also had dates wrapped in bacon
column2: sweet potatoes which I am not a fan of to begin with and ended up loving. We also got a goat cheese with marinara sauce that was served with garlic bread. We ended up ordering the seafood Paella
column3: which was enough to make us full at the end of the night. You should order this ahead of time as it does take 30 minutes to make.
